about.title: About - GoGBA
about.whatIsDesc: GoGBA is a Game Boy Advance (GBA) game emulator designed for mobile devices. Our goal is to provide a quiet, reliable, and immersive gaming experience for classic GBA titles like Pok√©mon, Fire Emblem, and Golden Sun.
about.philosophyDesc: GoGBA is built around a simple principle: focus, stability, and comfort. We prioritize:
about.philosophyQuiet: Quiet: No ads, no pop-ups, no distractions
about.philosophyReliable: Reliable: Your saves are safe and never lost
about.philosophyImmersive: Immersive: Clean UI with transparent buttons and minimal animations
about.philosophyComfortable: Comfortable: Dark themes designed for long gaming sessions
about.philosophyQuality: We believe in quality over features. GoGBA focuses on doing the essentials well, rather than overwhelming you with unnecessary options.
about.featureSeamless: Seamless Experience: Open the app and continue playing instantly. Your progress is always saved.
about.featureSave: Reliable Save System: Automatic saves every 10 seconds, plus saves on exit and when backgrounded. Atomic writes prevent data corruption.
about.featureThemes: Dark Themes: Five carefully designed dark themes optimized for eye comfort during long sessions.
about.featureInterface: Clean Interface: Minimal, distraction-free UI with transparent virtual buttons.
about.featureLayout: Flexible Layout: Portrait or landscape mode with orientation locking.
about.featureSpeed: Speed Control: Adjust game speed from 1x to 3x.
about.featureMultiLang: Multi-language: Support for 24 languages including English, Chinese, Japanese, and more.
about.featureCovers: Custom Covers: Search and select game covers from the libretro database.
about.coreLibretro: libretro gpSP core: A high-performance GBA emulation core integrated via FFI (Foreign Function Interface)
about.coreFlutter: Flutter: Cross-platform UI framework for consistent experience across platforms
about.coreRiverpod: Riverpod: State management for reliable app behavior
about.performance60fps: 60 FPS frame rate control for smooth gameplay
about.performanceRefresh: Refresh rate control on Android (automatically set to 60Hz during gameplay)
about.performanceRendering: Efficient rendering with stream-based game screen updates
about.performanceCaching: Cover image caching for faster library loading
about.privacyDesc: GoGBA is designed with privacy in mind:
about.privacyLocal: All data is stored locally on your device
about.privacyNoTransmit: Game files and saves never leave your device
about.privacyMore: For more information, see our Privacy Policy.
about.legalDesc: GoGBA is an emulation tool. You are responsible for ensuring you have the legal right to use any ROM files you load into the app. We do not provide, distribute, or facilitate access to ROM files. Please only use ROM files for games you legally own.
about.legalMore: For more information, see our Terms of Service.
about.opensourceLibretro: libretro gpSP core: Licensed under the GNU General Public License (GPL)
about.opensourceFlutter: Flutter: Licensed under the BSD 3-Clause License
about.opensourceOther: Various other open-source dependencies as listed in the app's license information
about.opensourceView: You can view the full license information within the app by going to Settings ‚Üí About ‚Üí License.
about.contactDesc: For questions, feedback, or support, please contact us:
about.contactSupport: Visit our Support page for frequently asked questions and troubleshooting help.
about.versionDesc: GoGBA is actively developed and improved. Key features include:
about.versionEmulation: Complete GBA emulation with libretro gpSP core
about.versionROM: Local ROM file access via SAF (Android) and File Picker (iOS)
about.versionLibrary: Game library management with list/grid views
about.versionSaves: Reliable save system with automatic saves
about.versionControls: Virtual button controls with haptic feedback
about.versionThemes: Dark themes optimized for long sessions
about.futureDesc: Planned features for future updates include:
about.futureButtons: Virtual button position and size customization
about.futureFocus: We focus on stability and user experience first, adding new features thoughtfully and carefully.

support.title: Support - GoGBA
support.intro: We're here to help! If you have questions, encounter issues, or need assistance with GoGBA, please don't hesitate to reach out.
support.contactDesc: For support inquiries, bug reports, feature requests, or general questions, please contact us at:
support.contactResponse: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 48 hours.
support.faqAddGames: How do I add games to GoGBA?
support.faqAddGamesDesc: GoGBA uses your device's file system to access game ROM files. To add games:
support.faqAddGames1: Open the App and tap the "Add Games" button
support.faqAddGames4: The App will automatically scan and add all GBA games in that folder
support.faqSaveFiles: Where are my save files stored?
support.faqSaveFilesDesc: Save files (.sav files) are stored locally on your device:
support.faqSaveFilesAuto: Save files are automatically saved every 10 seconds, when you exit the game, or when the app goes to the background.
support.faqController: Can I use GoGBA with a controller?
support.faqControllerDesc: Controller support is not currently available in this version of GoGBA. This feature may be added in future updates.
support.faqCloudDesc: Cloud save functionality is not currently available. All saves are stored locally on your device. We recommend regularly backing up your save files.
support.faqSpeed: How do I change the game speed?
support.faqSpeedDesc: While playing a game, tap the speed button (1x, 2x, or 3x) located in the game interface. You can adjust the speed from 1x (normal) to 3x (fastest).
support.faqCustomize: Can I customize the virtual button layout?
support.faqCustomizeDesc: Basic button customization is available. You can adjust button positions, sizes, and transparency through the settings menu. Full customization features are being developed for future updates.

support.faqThemeDesc: Go to Settings ‚Üí Display ‚Üí Theme to choose from available themes:
support.faqThemeList: OLED Neon (default), Dracula, Nord, Catppuccin Mocha, Gruvbox
support.faqCrashes: My game crashes or doesn't load. What should I do?
support.faqCrashesDesc: If you encounter crashes or loading issues:
support.faqCrashes1: Ensure your ROM file is a valid GBA file (.gba extension)
support.faqCrashes3: Check that you have sufficient storage space
support.faqCrashes4: Update to the latest version of GoGBA
support.faqCrashes5: Contact support with details about the issue
support.faqOrientation: Can I play games in both portrait and landscape mode?
support.faqOrientationDesc: Yes! GoGBA supports both portrait and landscape orientations. You can lock the orientation in Settings ‚Üí Display ‚Üí Orientation, or toggle it while playing a game through the in-game menu.
support.faqCache: How do I clear the cover cache?
support.faqCacheDesc: To clear cached game covers, go to Settings ‚Üí Data ‚Üí Clear Cover Cache. This will remove all downloaded cover images, and they will be re-downloaded when needed.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - GoGBA
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how GoGBA ("we", "our", or "us") collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our mobile application ("App").
privacy.section1_1Desc: GoGBA is designed with privacy in mind. We do not require you to create an account or provide personal information to use the App.
privacy.section1_2Desc: The App may collect the following information:
privacy.section1_2Game: Game Files: The App accesses game ROM files (.gba files) that you select through your device's file system. These files remain on your device and are never transmitted to us or any third party.
privacy.section1_2Save: Save Files: Game save files (.sav files) are stored locally on your device. We do not access, collect, or transmit your save data.
privacy.section1_2Config: App Configuration: Settings such as theme preferences, language selection, and orientation preferences are stored locally on your device.
privacy.section1_2Covers: Game Covers: Game cover images may be downloaded from the libretro database and cached locally on your device for faster loading.
privacy.section1_3Desc: If you enable crash reporting (via Firebase Crashlytics), we may collect anonymous crash reports to help improve the App's stability. These reports do not contain personal information or game data.
privacy.section2Desc: We use the information collected solely for the following purposes:
privacy.section2List1: To provide and maintain the App's functionality
privacy.section2List2: To improve the App's performance and stability
privacy.section2List3: To provide technical support when requested
privacy.section3Desc: All data associated with GoGBA is stored locally on your device:
privacy.section3Android: Android: Data is stored in the app's private directory and external storage (for save files).
privacy.section3iOS: iOS: Data is stored in the app's Documents directory.
privacy.section3Security: We implement appropriate technical measures to protect your data, including atomic write operations for save files to prevent data corruption.
privacy.section4Desc: The App uses the following third-party services:
privacy.section4Firebase: Firebase Crashlytics: For crash reporting (optional). See Firebase Privacy Policy.
privacy.section4Libretro: libretro Database: For game cover images. Cover images are downloaded from public databases and cached locally.
privacy.section5Desc: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your information to third parties. Your game files, save data, and personal information remain on your device and are never transmitted to our servers or any external service.
privacy.section6Desc: GoGBA is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately.
privacy.section7List1: Access your data stored locally on your device
privacy.section7List2: Delete the App and all associated data at any time
privacy.section7List3: Disable crash reporting in your device settings
privacy.section7List4: Contact us with questions about your privacy
privacy.section8Desc: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.
privacy.section9Desc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
